Detailed Description

A definition view provides a view-based container for displaying a single Wordnik dictionary definition.

It is the API client's responsibility to implement the WNDefinitionViewDelegate protocol and correctly handle displaying external links and additional word definitions.

See also:
WNDefinitionViewController
